description: A comprehensive 14-day ketogenic meal plan targeting approximately 75% fat, 20% protein, and 5% carbohydrates at a 2000-calorie base. Built around whole-food fat sources: avocados, olive oil, butter, nuts, fatty fish, and cheese. All scalable ingredients use precise gram measurements for proportional calorie adjustment. Based on evidence from systematic reviews (Bueno et al., 2013; Paoli et al., 2023) and current ketogenic nutrition guidelines.
scaling_notes: Scale all 'scalable: true' ingredients proportionally. For 2500cal, multiply by 1.25. Primary scaling levers: fat sources (olive oil, butter, nuts, avocado). Fixed items (spices, garnishes) stay constant.

instructions: Fry bacon until crispy, set aside.
Melt butter, scramble eggs with spinach.
Top with cheddar and crumbled bacon.
Grill seasoned chicken 6-7 min per side.
Chop romaine, toss with olive oil.
Slice chicken over salad, top with parmesan.
Sear salmon in oil 4 min per side.
Steam broccoli, toss in melted butter.
Serve together.
Slice avocado and arrange with salmon.
Add cream cheese dollops.
Drizzle olive oil, season with pepper.
Mix tuna with olive oil and diced celery.
Halve avocados, remove pits.
Fill generously with tuna mixture.
Sear chicken in butter 5 min per side.
Wilt spinach in same pan.
Add cream and parmesan, simmer until thickened.
Sauté mushrooms in half the butter.
Cook eggs as omelette in remaining butter.
Fill with mushrooms and mozzarella, fold.
Brown ground beef, drain.
Cook bacon crispy.
Bowl: romaine, beef, bacon, avocado, cheddar.
Rub lamb with oil and herbs, grill 3-4 min per side.
Sauté green beans in butter.
Rest lamb, serve together.
Mix coconut milk with chia seeds, refrigerate overnight.
Stir in melted butter.
Top with cream and pecans.
Sear salmon skin-down in oil 4 min, flip 3 min.
Steam asparagus, toss in melted butter.
Serve together.
Stir-fry beef strips in coconut oil 3 min.
Add broccoli, cook 5 min.
Finish with sesame oil.
Press sausage into greased muffin tins.
Add pepper, crack egg in each.
Top with cheddar, bake 180°C for 18 min.
Stir-fry sliced chicken in coconut oil 5 min.
Add broccoli and zucchini 4-5 min.
Season with salt, pepper, soy sauce.
Bake cod at 190°C for 15 min.
Boil cauliflower, drain.
Melt butter+cream+cheddar, pour over cauliflower.
Whisk eggs with spinach, bake in muffin tins at 180°C for 12 min.
Blend butter, coconut oil, cream into coffee.
Serve muffins with bulletproof coffee.
Grill chicken, fry bacon, boil eggs.
Arrange in rows over romaine.
Drizzle olive oil.
Coat chicken in almond flour + parmesan.
Pan-fry in olive oil 5 min per side.
Top with mozzarella, melt under broiler.
Spread cream cheese on salmon slices.
Add avocado strips.
Roll up, drizzle with olive oil.
Sear pork in oil 4 min per side.
Boil cauliflower, mash with butter and cream.
Serve pork sliced over mash.
Grill steak 3-4 min per side.
Mix diced avocado and tomato for salsa.
Rest steak, slice, top with salsa.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Fry eggs in bacon fat.
Arrange in bowl with sliced avocado, drizzle oil.
Sauté shrimp in half the oil 2-3 min per side.
Arrange spinach, sliced avocado.
Top with shrimp, drizzle remaining oil.
Cook spiced chicken in coconut oil 8 min.
Add butter, cream, tomato paste. Simmer 10 min.
Sauté riced cauliflower 5 min. Serve.
Mix almond butter with melted coconut oil, freeze in moulds.
Scramble eggs in butter.
Serve with 2-3 fat bombs.
Slice zucchini thin, salt and dry.
Brown beef in oil.
Layer zucchini, beef, cream cheese, mozzarella. Bake 190°C 20 min.
Sear pork in oil, finish in oven 190°C 15 min.
Fry bacon, sauté sprouts in bacon fat.
Add butter, serve with sliced pork.
Heat oil, wilt spinach in an oven-safe pan.
Make wells, crack in eggs.
Top with cheese, bake at 190°C until set.
Cook diced chicken in coconut oil 8 min.
Add walnuts, toss.
Spoon into lettuce cups, top with sour cream.
Sauté shrimp in butter 2 min per side.
Add cream + parmesan sauce.
Toss in zucchini noodles 2 min.
Cook eggs as thin omelettes in butter.
Layer ham, cheese, avocado.
Roll up and slice.
Chop boiled eggs, crumble bacon.
Mix with olive oil.
Serve over sliced avocado.
Form beef into meatballs, brown 10 min.
Make cheese sauce: butter + cream + cheddar.
Sauté zucchini, serve with meatballs and sauce.
Soft-boil eggs 6.5 min, peel.
Fry bacon crispy.
Arrange all on plate, drizzle oil over avocado.
Sear steak in oil 3-4 min per side, rest.
Sauté mushrooms in butter.
Slice steak, top with mushrooms.
Blend half oil + parmesan + nuts for pesto.
Grill pesto-coated chicken 6-7 min per side.
Grill asparagus, drizzle remaining oil.
Grease dish with butter, spread wilted spinach.
Whisk eggs with cream, pour over.
Top with cheese, bake 180°C for 18 min.
Brown beef with taco spices.
Bowl: romaine, beef, avocado, cheddar, sour cream.
Mix salmon, almond flour, egg. Form patties.
Fry in butter 3-4 min per side.
Steam green beans, serve with sour cream.
Blend cream cheese, eggs, almond butter.
Cook small pancakes in butter.
Serve with crispy bacon.
Grill salmon 4-5 min per side.
Massage kale with half the oil.
Top with salmon, macadamias, remaining oil.

meals.meal_name: Roast Chicken Thighs with Buttered Veg
instructions: Rub chicken with oil, salt, pepper. Roast 200°C 25-30 min.
Steam broccoli and cauliflower.
Toss veg in melted butter, serve with chicken.
